form.p: JSmooth is a '.exe' wrapper, that easies the pain of launching a Java application on Windows. It builds standard Windows executable binaries (.exe) that contain all the information needed to launch your Java application, i.e. the classpath, the Java properties, the JVM version required, and so on. If Java is not installed, it helps the users by displaying them a notice before launching automatically a browser to a web site where they can download a JVM.
JSmooth is currently in beta phase. It is provided in the hope it can be useful to the Java community, but always keep in mind that it's still beta.
